name: LodgingReservation
desc: A hotel reservation or other booking for a place to stay.

items.name: checkinTime
items.desc: The earliest the guest may check in.

items.name: checkoutTime
items.desc: The latest the guest may check out.

items.name: reservationFor
items.desc: The location of the lodging, such as a hotel or inn.

items.name: reservationId
items.desc: A unique identifier for the reservation, consistent in all markup.

items.name: underName
items.desc: The lodging guest, or a primary guest if the event provider doesn’t require a name for each guest.

items.name: url
items.desc: A webpage the user can access to view reservation details.
